about_the_game:
Soda-Powered Penguin is a fast-paced, momentum-based precision platformer featuring a destructive penguin strapped to a soda bottle. The soda bottle enables dashes, double jumps, and generally lots of speed- all of which is used to conquer hand-crafted challenges.

Features
  • Colorful hand-pixeled levels set in a soda-centric world. Wreak havoc as a chaotic penguin!
  • Hundreds of unique platforming challenges
  • Find secret areas by squeezing into tiny gaps!
  • Collect unique bottlecaps from a variety of brands
  • Unlockable challenge levels for those who want to explore the game's limits
  • High replayability through discovering a bounty of shortcuts and techniques to whittle down level clear times
  • Fully remappable controls and plenty of accessibility options
  • Penguin honking
